product_name: Hero CosmeticsBright Eyes Illuminating Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackHero Cosmetics Bright Eyes Illuminating Eye Cream starring niacinamide and a luminizing tint, Bright Eyes visibly improves the look of dark circles* and awakens tired-looking eyes* to help you start your day. *after multiple applications
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly improves the look of dark circles*Awakens tired-looking eyes*Layers well with concealer*after multiple applicationsFeaturesStainless steel tip provides a cooling sensationGlides on smoothDoesn’t leave a sticky residue or filmFeels lightweightKey IngredientsNiacinamide: Brightens the appearance of dark circlesCaffeine: Smooths under eyesLuminizing Tint: Color-corrects & illuminatesItem 2624659How To UseSqueeze tube to release product onto wand tip.Dot under eyes, then glide tip to blend into skin.Pat excess into skin if needed.Precautions: Use only as directed. For external use only. Stop use if irritation occurs. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, C13-15 Alkane, Propanediol, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caffeine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Coffea Arabica Seed Extract, Allantoin, Tocopherol, Niacinamide, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Vaccinium Macrocarpon Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Panax Quinquefolius Root Extract, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Lecithin, Behenyl Alcohol, Arachidyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Arachidyl Alcohol, Sodium Phytate, Hexylene Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Malic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Glucose, Astaxanthin, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide Yellow (CI 77492).
how_to_use: Squeeze tube to release product onto wand tip.Dot under eyes, then glide tip to blend into skin.Pat excess into skin if needed.Precautions: Use only as directed. For external use only. Stop use if irritation occurs. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Mold and dark complexions - No
reviews.comments: Don't buy this. It literally does not work and is just an attractive packaging. READ THE INGREDIENTS

reviews.headline: Grows mold
reviews.comments: Bought this twice and both times it grew mold in the applicator. I keep it in a dry, clean place with the lid on it. No reason that should've happened.

reviews.headline: Mold
reviews.comments: the applicator grew mold on it after 2 uses andni kept it is a clean and dry environment. the formula also isn't special. not worth it.

reviews.headline: mold
reviews.comments: the applicator grew mold on it after only less than a week use. I kept is in a clean and dry environment so idk why it did that. the formula also isn't special. it actually dried out my skin.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I did try this once and niw im obsessed, idk why all the negative reviews everyone us different but for me it works, it goes smooth and once you distribute the product it leaves a nice glow…

reviews.headline: Absolutely love
reviews.comments: This is one of my favorite eye creams for brightening my under eyes with a subtle tint. It lasts all day with no weird creasing or flaking. Definitely recommend this to anyone!

reviews.headline: Not effective on darker complexions
reviews.comments: I noticed after using this cream for quite some time that it dries with a white residue left over. And then it just looks like I put on under eye concealer that was not my shade at all. Not a fan. Do not recommended for anyone to be honest.

reviews.headline: Works
reviews.comments: I got this for my daughter because she has darker shadows under her eyes. I noticed a difference and she loves it. She has sensitive skin and caused no reactions.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again, wish I returned it.
reviews.comments: This is too thin and watery and yellow not skin tone.

reviews.headline: Works decent
reviews.comments: Easy to apply, works as advertised.  Will buy again.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: Applicator is great but i do not see a difference sometimes i put alot under my eye just to sleep with overnight buy i dont see any brightening

reviews.headline: Nothing special
reviews.comments: I didn't see or feel anything special, kinda drying and no brightening .

reviews.headline: This is amazing!!!!
reviews.comments: I cant say enough good things about this. This goes on really smooth and the applicator is really nice. It is a little messy but this stuff dries so fast and blends out really easily. I have oily skin and it also is very brightening.

faceoff_positive.comments: I cant say enough good things about this. This goes on really smooth and the applicator is really nice. It is a little messy but this stuff dries so fast and blends out really easily. I have oily skin and it also is very brightening.
faceoff_positive.headline: This is amazing!!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I noticed after using this cream for quite some time that it dries with a white residue left over. And then it just looks like I put on under eye concealer that was not my shade at all. Not a fan. Do not recommended for anyone to be honest.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not effective on darker complexions
